page.title: 20LOCAL DIALECT
page.content: A survey was made of local words,and the following were the most common in everyday use. Local word Meaning Local word Meaning Coustie Nice Bari Good Ladged Embarrassed Gadgee Man Manichee Girl Capture Girlfriend Chava Boy Chowie Lovebite Radgie Stupid Lowie Money Juggel Dog Deek Look Sheerie Hair Keir House Plaff Feet Mot Girl Starvation Cold Bagie. Head/Turnip Shan Bad Muckle-Big Large The following are two local sayings and their meanings:"Gee-im heat" means To make fun of him. "Cannie be slavered" means I cannot be bothered. Most of these words and phrases are used by young people at school,and at play.
